title: Image-Line Deckadance DVS Edition v2.30 WiN MacOSX Incl.Keygen-R
description:
Image-Line Deckadance DVS Edition v2.30









Deckadance is a DJ mixing application that works either as a standalone program OR as a VSTi inside your favourite host. Deckadance itself can also host any VST compliant softsynth or effect.
You can control Deckadance using most (if not all) existing midi controllers & timecoded vinyl and CD systems.




New in version 2

Choose 2 OR 4 decks. Smart knobs link many interface targets to one knob. GrossBeat automated glitch, stutter & scratch functions. Isolator FX chain up to three FX per deck and apply to Low/Mid/High or all bands. Customizable interface and Smart panels select Cue, Grid, DVS, Key, Smart Knob and Tempo controls.



DVS support

Deckadance supports most brands of Digital Vinyl Software products or
you can create your own Deckadance DVS CD to use in your hardware.
Brands supported include msPinky, Stanton FinalScratch, MixVibes,
Serato Scratch Live, Virtual DJ, PCDJ Reflex & Torq.




System requirements


   OS: Windows XP (SP2) /Vista /Windows 7 & 8.
   Processor: Intel PIII 1 GHz or Althon XP 1.4 GHz.
   Memory: 512Mb RAM.
   Hard Disk Space: 200MB free space.
   Sound Card: DirectSound or ASIO compatible soundcard.


see more @ https://www.image-line.com/deckadance/




[Installation]


. UnRar

. Uninstall previous versions.

. Install.

. Use the keygen on Windows,
 or pre generated keyfile "TEAM R2R 2013.reg".

. Register with that keyfile.
